description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Go for high scores and do tricks as you sled the legendary slopes of Mt. Kittimanjaro.  Also includes a laser pointer toy for your cat.
description.short: Go for high scores and do tricks as you sled the legendary slopes of Mt. Kittimanjaro.  Also includes a laser pointer toy for your cat.
